import React, { Component } from "react"; import GamePage from "./GamePage.jsx"; class Game extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { details: this.props.game, }; } render() { return (

{this.state.details.name}

{this.state.details.developer}

); } } export default Game; { /*

{this.state.info.name}

Developer {this.state.info.developer}
Rating {this.state.info.rating}
Platform(s) {this.state.info.platform}
Release {this.state.info.release}
Price {this.state.info.price}



Game Description

{this.state.description}

*/ }
